_Please note â€” Blueprints requests are for adding or updating existing content on the site. For new content or for edits to existing assets, please [create a Jira ticket in the Communication Design project](https://issues.liferay.com/projects/COMMDESIGN/issues?filter=allopenissues)._

Please supply the following:

- [ ] Links to assets / content
- [ ] Brief description of the content
- [ ] _optional_ Requested location (e.g. Resources > Illustrations)
